job_description:
**Job Description ***
Insight Global is looking for an experienced Senior Software Engineer to join our team. In this role, you will be a key contributor to our software development projects, focusing on Node.js, TypeScript, and React. While experience with Java and AWS is not required, you should be open to learning AWS cloud native development and AWS CDK through resources like Udemy. Your extensive experience, strong development skills, and knowledge of Agile and Scrum methodologies will be essential to our success. To excel in this role, you should have a strong motivation, a go-getter mentality, and excellent communication skills. This opportunity will be 3 days on site.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and maintain high-quality software solutions.
Lead and contribute to hands-on development using Node.js, TypeScript, and React, ensuring code quality and best practices.
Drive the adoption of modern software engineering principles and practices within the team.
Mentor junior developers, providing guidance and support to help them grow.
Participate in Agile and Scrum processes, including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives.
Design and implement software architecture and components to meet project requirements.
Perform code reviews to ensure code quality, maintainability, and adherence to coding standards.
Collaborate with product owners to define user stories, requirements, and acceptance criteria.
Continuously explore and recommend new technologies, tools, and best practices.
Be an advocate for software quality, scalability, and performance.

**Required Skills and Experience ***
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
10+ years of software development experience with expertise in Node.js, TypeScript, and React.
Willingness to learn AWS cloud native development and AWS CDK through online courses.
Hands-on experience in software development, including design, coding, and testing.
Familiarity with Agile and Scrum methodologies.
Proficiency in at least one other programming language, such as Java, .Net, or C#.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently or as part of a team.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to provide technical leadership and mentorship.

Why Join Us:
Opportunity to work on exciting projects using cutting-edge technologies.
Competitive compensation and benefits package.
Ongoing opportunities for professional development and learning.
A collaborative and inclusive work environment that values innovation and teamwork.
If you are a seasoned Senior Software Engineer with a passion for Node.js, TypeScript, and React, and you're eager to learn and adapt, we invite you to apply and be a part of our dynamic team. Your expertise and leadership will be crucial in delivering top-notch software solutions.
